snippet: The appeal of the Boxcar Bar and Grill, housed in a train station, has mostly to do with the beautiful way that the restaurant’s owners have renovated the historic depot, which dates to 1907.
abstract: Fran Schumer reviews The Boxcar Bar and Grill in Short Hills (Metropolitan/New Jersey).
lead_paragraph: The appeal of the Boxcar Bar and Grill, housed in a train station, has mostly to do with the beautiful way that the restaurant’s owners have renovated the historic depot, which dates to 1907.

headline.seo: A Review of the Boxcar Bar and Grill, in Short Hills
